Description: Define the project vision and high-level goals
Create and prioritize the product backlog
Plan the work for the upcoming sprint
Daily stand-up meeting to discuss progress and obstacles
Develop and test the planned features
Review the completed work with stakeholders
Reflect on the sprint and identify improvements
Ensure all criteria for "done" are met
Refine and prioritize the product backlog
Evaluate the release and gather feedback
Review the overall project and identify long-term improvements
